Key Match Events: Matt Wallner hit a home run in the second inning to tie the game at 1-1
Nolan Schanuel hit a home run in the third inning to give the Angels a 2-1 lead
Brooks Lee broke out of a 0-19 slump with a double in the fourth inning, driving in two runs and giving the Twins a 4-2 lead
Jordyn Adams hit a home run in the sixth inning to bring the Angels within one run at 4-3
Griffin Jax pitched a scoreless seventh inning

Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on September 12, 2024
The Twins won the game 6-4, ending a 10-day losing streak
Others: The Twins relied on rookie pitcher Zebby Matthews to start the game
The Angels countered with rookie pitcher Jack Kochanowicz
The Twins honored those who died on September 11, 2001 during the game
